data.text:
Prabhas‘ upcoming movie Kalki 2898 AD has been officially delayed. The film is now set to hit theaters worldwide on June 27. With its postponement, fans are eager to know more details about its plot. However, only some specific information has been unveiled by the makers. Now, a report has revealed Kamal Haasan’s role in the movie and it is an interesting one.

What is Kamal Haasan’s role in Prabhas’ Kalki 2898 AD?

Kamal Haasan is touted to play an extended cameo in the upcoming sci-fi dystopian action drama. According to a report by Telugu360.com, the Tamil star will play an antagonist in the movie. The report claimed that his role is inspired by Kamsa, aka Kamsudu, who does not spare anyone for his will.

As per the same report, director Nag Ashwin and his team have designed Haasan’s role as someone who wants to capture the world. Moreover, his first glimpse is allegedly ready and will be released soon.

Besides Kamal Haasan, Prabhas plays the lead role of Bhairava. On the other hand, Kalki 2898 AD also features Bollywood star Amitabh Bachchan. He portrays the role of the immortal Ashwatthama, and his first glimpse has already been revealed. This has intrigued the audience and fueled their excitement for the project. Actress Deepika Padukone is the leading lady, while Disha Patani plays a supporting character.

On the work front, Kamal Haasan will be next seen in his upcoming film Indian 2. After almost three decades, the actor is set to reprise his role as Senapathy in the forthcoming movie. Moreover, Haasan will also be seen in an action avatar in Thug Life. The movie boasts an ensemble cast and is currently in production. He is also expected to have a cameo in Ilaiyaraaja’s biopic, led by Dhanush.
